title: A third straight week of tech layoffs in the books - TechCrunch
content:
1. A third straight week of tech layoffs in the books  TechCrunch
  2. Startup Layoffs Start as Tech Stocks Get a Crushing Reality Check  Bloomberg
  3. Tech Layoffs And Hiring Freezes Appear To Accelerate  Crunchbase News
  4. Tech is hitting the brakes on hiring even as other industries keep adding jobs  CNBC
  5. For Tech Startups, The Party Is Over  Mint
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: You thought the market was bad for VCs, but what about the workers behind the tech companies they’ve backed? Reluctantly, we’re writing another tech layoffs roundup.
